Puerto Plata - Bahia Principe San Juan
Pin It Hotel Apple Rating: TripAdvisor Traveler Rating:
Based on 3170 reviews All Inclusive Value Plus HONEYMOONERS: BOTTLE OF RUM, FRUIT BASKET AND ROOM UPGRADE (BASED ON AVAILABILITY). BAHIA PRINCIPE SAN JUAN is located on the North Coast of the Dominican Republic. It was opened in July 1995, fully renovated in Nov 2007, and is set on a 1 mile private beach which is sheltered by a coral reef. It covers an area of over one and a half million square feet and is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation with mangrove swamps. It has number of tropical gardens, which are the setting for little lanes along which guests can walk while enjoying the sea breeze and the freshness of the natural surroundings. Ideal for a younger crowd, there are plenty of beach activities during the day and at night; the crowd goes wild at the PUEBLO PRINCIPE. The hotel has its own Shopping&entertainment center, which is open 24hrs. It includes shops, disco, casino, shows, live music, doctor and much more.
